metadata.title: CVE-2021-21643 jenkins-2-plugins/config-file-provider: Does not correctly perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints. (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the config-file-provider Jenkins plugin. The plugin does not correctly perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, as a consequence an attacker with global Job/Configure permission can enumerate system-scoped credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
